name: jinpyojeon.github.io
body:
### Hi, I'm Jin Pyo Jeon

I'm a sophomore at Trinity College (located in Hartford, CT) planning to major in CS & math and minor in philosophy.

I'm current interested in functional languages, artificial intelligence, and robotics.

### Resume

[Resume](https://github.com/jinpyojeon/jinpyojeon.github.io/raw/master/Resume.pdf)

### Samples of (Academic) Writing

Given the possible concerns over my communication skills, here are several academic papers I have written in college (because, as everyone knows, academic writings most closely resemble communications in real life).

[Nootropics for Healthy Individuals](https://github.com/jinpyojeon/jinpyojeon.github.io/raw/master/Nootropics%20for%20Healthy%20Individuals.pdf)
[On Anselm's Ontological Argument](https://github.com/jinpyojeon/jinpyojeon.github.io/raw/master/OnAnselmsOntologicalArgument.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
